At 732 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Rib Mountain to 7 miles northwest of Stevens Point to 7 miles west of Wisconsin Rapids, moving southeast at 50 mph.

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 7:23PM CDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTH CENTRAL ST. LOUIS, EASTERN CARLTON AND NORTHWESTERN DOUGLAS COUNTIES THROUGH 800 PM CDT... At 723 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Pike Lake Near Duluth, to near Fond Du Lac Band Sawyer Area, moving southeast at 25 mph.

entry.title: Beach Hazards Statement issued August 11 at 10:44AM CDT until August 11 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...BEACH HAZARDS STATEMENT IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Dangerous swimming conditions are expected along the Lake Superior shoreline due to high wave action and strong rip currents. * WHERE...Minnesota Park Point and Wisconsin Point Beaches. * WHEN...Until 9 PM CDT this evening.
